attributes.title: Aadheenam Chalo Series - Integrated Puja Leads To Freedom
attributes.description:
In this beautiful satsang discourse delivered on 19 June, 2017, His Holiness Bhagwan Paramahamsa Sri Nithyananda shared that if He hadn't started His public mission, He would be a pujari. The amrita, the burning sweetness that flows from the Sahasrara Chakra in moments of pure divine communion, flows during an integrated puja. 

He also revealed a huge gift He is giving to all who accept Him as guru: a free puja kit, Guru Padukas and manual on how to do puja. If you're ready to experience the bhava samadhi of pure devotion expressed through puja to Nithyananda, send an email to oohh@nithyananda.org
